select count(*) from members where nickname = #{nickname}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO members (id, password, nickname, birthday, gender, status) VALUES (#{id}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{birthday}, #{gender}, #{status})
mapper.select: select id as username, password, nickname, case when status = 'active' then true else false end as enabled, case when is_admin = '0' then false when is_admin = '1' then true end as isAdmin from members where id = #{username} and oauth_id is null
select image from members where id = #{memberId}

select distinct c.media_title as mediaTitle, r.content, r.post_date as postDate, r.correct_date as correctDate , r.is_deleted as isDeleted, r.media_id as mediaId, r.media_type as mediaType, r.no, r.parent_no as parentNo from reviews r join collections c on r.media_id = c.media_id and r.media_type = c.media_type where r.members_id = #{userId} order By r.post_date desc LIMIT #{startNo}, #{size}
select count(*) from reviews where members_id = #{userId}

select distinct c.media_title as mediaTitle, r.content, r.post_date as postDate, r.correct_date as correctDate, r.is_deleted as isDeleted, r.media_id as mediaId, r.media_type as mediaType, r.no, r.parent_no as parentNo from reviews r join collections c on r.media_id = c.media_id and r.media_type = c.media_type where r.members_id = #{userId} AND REPLACE(c.media_title, ' ', '') LIKE REPLACE(CONCAT('%',#{word},'%'), ' ', '') order By r.post_date desc LIMIT #{startNo}, #{size}

select count(distinct r.no) from reviews r join collections c on r.media_id = c.media_id and r.media_type = c.media_type where r.members_id = #{userId} AND REPLACE(c.media_title, ' ', '') LIKE REPLACE(CONCAT('%',#{word},'%'), ' ', '')
mapper.insert: insert ignore into members_oauth(provider, member_id) values (#{provider}, #{providerId})

insert into members(id, password, gender, status, nickname, oauth_id) values (#{providerId}, left(#{providerId}, 15), 'N', 'active', #{nickname}, (select mo.id from members_oauth mo where mo.provider = #{provider} and mo.member_id = #{providerId} limit 1) )
